text: Kodi iwe siudaone kuti zinthu zonse zimalambira Mulungu mwachitsanzo zinthu zimene zimakhala kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi monga dzuwa, mwezi, nyenyezi, mapiri mitengo, nyama ndi anthu ambiri? Koma pali ambiri amene chilango ndi chowayenera. Aliyense amene achititsidwa manyazi ndi Mulungu, palibe wina amene angamulemekeze. Ndithudi! Mulungu amachita zimene afuna
